A new verification link has been sent to: I ye imɛli ladɛrɛsi min di i tɔgɔ sɛbɛnni senfɛ, sɛgɛsɛgɛli yɔrɔ kura dɔ cilen don.

Each recovery code can be used once to a: Kode segin-segin kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ se ka kɛ siɲɛ kelen walasa ka se i ka jatebɔsɛbɛn na, wa a bɛna bɔ baara kɛlen kɔfɛ. N’i ​​mago bɛ kunnafoni wɛrɛw la, i ka Regenerate Codes sanfɛ.
Enable Two-Factor Authentication: Seko ni dɔnko fila-fila dantigɛli daminɛ .
Ensure your account is using a long, ran: Aw ye aw jija aw ka jatebɔsɛbɛn ka baara kɛ ni kumasen jan ye, min tɛ kɛ cogo si la walasa ka to lakana la .
Enter the 6-digit code from your authent: Aw bɛ kode 6 sɛbɛn ka bɔ aw ka Authenticator app kɔnɔ.
Enter the authentication code provided b: I ka Authenticator Application ye dantigɛli sɛbɛn min di, i k’o sɛbɛn.
Enter your details below to create your: Aw ye aw ka kunnafoni sɛbɛn jukɔrɔ walasa ka aw ka jatebɔsɛbɛn dilan .

Enter your email to receive a password r: I ka e-mail sɛbɛn walasa ka tɔgɔlasɛbɛn sɔrɔ min bɛ se ka kɛ i ka tɔgɔlasɛbɛn ye .
Forgot your password?: I ɲinɛna i ka tɔgɔlasɛbɛn kɔ wa?
Log in to your account: I ka don i ka jatebɔsɛbɛn kɔnɔ .
Manage your profile and account settings: I ka profile ani i ka jatebɔcogo ɲɛnabɔ .

Once your account is deleted, all of its: Ni i ka jatebɔsɛbɛn bɔra, a ka nafolo ni a ka kunnafoniw bɛɛ fana bɛna bɔ yen kudayi. Aw ye a sɛmɛntiya ko aw b’a fɛ ka aw ka jatebɔsɛbɛn bɔ yen kudayi.
Ni i ka jatebɔsɛbɛn bɔra yen, a ka nafolo ni a ka kunnafoniw bɛɛ bɛna bɔ yen kudayi. I ka i ka tɔgɔlasɛbɛn sɛbɛn walasa k’a jira ko i b’a fɛ k’i ka jatebɔsɛbɛn bɔ yen kudayi.
Please confirm access to your account by: Aw bɛ se ka don aw ka jatebɔsɛbɛn kɔnɔ ni aw ye aw ka kɔrɔtɔko kode dɔ sɛbɛn.
Please enter your new password below: Aw ye aw ka kumasen kura sɛbɛn jukɔrɔ .
Please verify your email address by clic: Aw ye aw ka e-mail ladɛrɛsi sɛgɛsɛgɛ ni aw ye an ka email ci aw ma sisan.
Recovery codes let you regain access if: Kode minnu bɛ segin ka kɛ, olu b’a to i bɛ se ka don kokura ni i ye i ka 2FA minɛn bɔnɛ. Aw bɛ u mara ni tɔgɔlasɛbɛn ɲɛmɔgɔ ye min bɛ lakana.
This is a secure area of the application: Nin ye yɔrɔ lakananen ye min bɛ sɔrɔ ɲinini na. Aw ye aw ka tɔgɔlasɛbɛn dafa sani aw ka taa ɲɛ.
To finish enabling two-factor authentica: Walasa ka se ka fɛn fila-fila dantigɛli daminɛ, i ka QR code sɛgɛsɛgɛ walima ka Setup key don i ka Authenticator app kɔnɔ.

Update your account's appearance setting: Aw ka jatebɔsɛbɛn ka ɲɛfɔli kɛcogo kura .

View Recovery Codes: Kode minnu bɛ se ka sɔrɔ, olu lajɛ .
When you enable two-factor authenticatio: Ni i ye fɛn fila-fila-sɛgɛsɛgɛli daminɛ, i bɛna a ɲini i fɛ i ka pinɛ lakananen sɔrɔ don waati la. Nin Pin in bɛ se ka sɔrɔ TOTP-dɛmɛ-application dɔ la i ka telefɔni na.
With two-factor authentication enabled,: Ni fɛn fila-fila dantigɛli daminɛna, a bɛna ɲini i fɛ i ka PIN lakananen, k’a sɔrɔ i ma kɛ i ka don ye, i bɛ se ka min sɔrɔ TOTP-dɛmɛ-application kɔnɔ i ka telefɔni na.
I ka imeyilɛri ladɛrɛsi ma sɛgɛsɛgɛ.
